title: Experience Japan's Coolest New Ski Resort with Lift Pass Included
description: Discover the hottest new ski resort in Japan, the luxurious Lotte Arai Resort in Myoko, only two hours from Tokyo. Arai is blessed with the deepest powder in Japan, with an average of around 15 metres each season; more than the much-frequented Niseko and with less of the queuing. Enjoy an unforgettable ski-in, ski-out escape with daily breakfast, one dinner for two, two-day lift passes, access to the resort’s natural hot springs and activity centre with rock climbing, trampolining and more. Travelling as a family? Pick an upgraded Group package with accommodation and inclusions for up to four people

title: Japan Niigata City Centre Escape near Shinano River
description: ANA Crowne Plaza Niigata, an IHG Hotel, offers stunning views and a convenient location in the heart of this seaside city. Diverse culinary choices await you in the numerous onsite restaurants, while authentic local delicacies can be found in markets and nearby eateries. As the sun sets, look out over the Niigata skyline with dazzling vistas of neon lights and the Shinano River, while indulging in a cool cocktail from the comfort of the top-floor Sky Bar.
location_description: ANA Crowne Plaza Niigata, an IHG Hotel
